name: La Città degli Animali (Cap I)
description:
La Città degli Animali (Animal City) Cap. I

Note: This game is in italian. Since there are very few texts this is not limiting: just click "Gioca" to start playing.

Instructions: click/tap to inspect elements, long click/long tap to interact with them.

When I started this project I didn't find any HTML-based engine for 2d point-and-click games. So I wrote my own. It is very simple: I use vue.js directives to dynamically modify the DOM. I exploit the fact that SVG is a HTML-like format so I had  a free level editor: inkscape  :)

The game is the story of a cat in a dystopian city  called La Città degli Animali  (Animal City).  Here I published the first charapter: the cat must go to school. If you like my idea tell me here or drop me an email, I'll be happy to her feedbacks!

Game is tested only in Chome and Firefox.
